title: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit visits Stanford Graduate School of Business
summary: Interviewed by a Stanford Graduate School of Business MBA student for their "View from the Top" speaker series, Citi CEO Vikram Pandit answered questions about the economic crisis, leadership, and the future of the banking industry.
tag-1: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit visits Stanford Graduate School of Business
